content: saint anthony cable hat by heideh sarfehjoo size adult medium to large note this pattern uses a 10-stitch motif so to make the pattern larger or smaller add or subtract 10 stitches materials approximately 120 yards of bulky weight yarn us size 10 5 6 5 mm circular needles or dpns cable needle or dpn yarn needle for weaving ends gauge 3 stitches per inch in stockinette abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together ssk slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time to right needle insert left needle into the front of the stitches and then knit the 2 stitches together c4f slip 2 stitches onto the cable needle and hold in front of work knit the next 2 stitches then knit the 2 stitches from the cable needle c4b slip 2 stitches onto the cable needle and hold in back of work knit the next 2 stitches then knit the 2 stitches from the cable needle pattern cast on 80 stitches join and work in the round row 1-6 p2 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 repeat to end of round cable pattern do 4 sets of the following 7 row 1 p2 c4f c4b repeat to end of round 2 p2 k8 repeat to end of round 3-7 p2 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 repeat to end of round top decreases 1 p2 slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold in front of work k2tog k2tog from cable needle slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold in back of work ssk ssk from cable needle repeat to end of round 2 p2 k4 repeat to end of round 3 p2 ssk k2tog repeat to end of round 4 p2 k2 repeat to end of round 5 p2 k2tog repeat to end of round 6 p2 k1 repeat to end of round 7 p2tog k1 repeat to end of round cut yarn and draw through remaining 16 sts weave in ends block as needed
